titleStmt.title: A sermon preached the 11. of May 1652. In Taunton, upon the occasion of their great deliverance, received upon that day. / By George Newton Master of Arts, and minister of Gods word in that place.
titleStmt.author: Newton, George, 1602-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Roybould at the Unicorne in Pauls Church-yard London; and are to be sold by George Treagle in Taunton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Unicorne in Pauls Church-yard London;
